title: flight reservations
htmlText:
Fly with Kenya Airways into Mombasa, Kenya and enjoy our special, exclusive discounts for the attendees of Wapor SSA Regional Conference 2024.

The promo code: WAPOR24
image-caption: Get more information on the promotion and your flight reservations here

benefit-items.label: Discount: 15% off base fare International Flights
Discount: 5% off base fare Domestic Flights
Applicable on Kenya Airways-operated flights only
Discounts are applicable on net fares only, excluding taxes and surcharges
